name: hyperbridge-tron
description: TronBox deployment for Hyperbridge ISMP contracts on TRON

scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/@hyperbridge/core && ln -sf contracts/interfaces interfaces 2>/dev/null; ln -sf contracts/libraries libraries 2>/dev/null; ln -sf contracts/apps apps 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.tre: docker rm -f tre 2>/dev/null; docker run -d --name tre -p 9090:9090 --platform linux/arm64 -e accounts=1 -e defaultBalance=100000 -e 'mnemonic=test test test test test test test test test test test junk' tronbox/tre:latest && echo 'TRE starting on http://127.0.0.1:9090 â€” wait ~60s for accounts to be funded'

author: Polytope Labs (hello@polytope.technology)
